categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Mahan was a CR90 corvette in the Rebel Alliance Fleet.
This vessel helped evacuate Alliance troops from Brigia during Operation Strike Fear. It was destroyed by the Imperial-class Star Destroyer Invincible, which arrived during the evacuation.
The name "Mahan" has several meanings in the real world, notably including four United States Navy ships named USS Mahan, plus an entire class that served in World War II.[source?]
